# GLASS: Generator for Large Scale Structure

## Overview

::: {layout-nrow="2"}

::: {.cell}

GLASS, the generator for large scale structure, is a library for performing the
kind of simulation that is useful in the field of cosmology.

:::

::: {.cell}

![](figures/spheres.png){fig-alt="A three-part diagram of the GLASS code
simulation process showing nested spherical shells of the universe, a full-sky
projection of cosmic matter density, and a high-resolution zoomed-in view of
density fluctuations."}

:::
